base.__comment: {160} For the stuff that goes in every creature (For now all creatures have all five core materials)

category.__comment: {100} Creature categories are based on creature origin

core.__comment: {194} Core parts, UPPERBODY, LOWERBODY, and HEAD

CORE_3PART.__comment: {20,2}     3 part body with (1,2)   head connected to the upper body with a neck and throat

CORE_2PART.__comment: {100,20,1} 2 part body with (1,2,3) head connected to the upper body with a neck and throat

CORE_1PART.__comment: {40}       1 part body with 1       head connected to the upper body with a neck and throat

CORE_WORM.__comment: {10}       1 part body with 1       head in body

SCYTHE_ARM.__comment: {50,25}      (2,4)   shoulder, upper arm, elbow, scythe (e.g. praying mantis)

PINCH_ARM.__comment: {50,25}      (2,4)   shoulder, upper arm, elbow, lower arm, pincer

6PART_ARM.__comment: {200,100,20} (2,4,6) shoulder, upper arm, elbow, lower arm, wrist, hand

WING_ARM.__comment: {50,25,5}    (2,4,6) single part wing     attached to the upper body

TENTACLE_ARM.__comment: {30,15}      (2,4)   single part tentacle attached to the upper body

FLIPPER_ARM.__comment: {30,15}      (2,4)   single part flipper  attached to the upper body

HOOF_LEG.__comment: {30,60,30}       (2,4,6)    hip, upper leg, knee, lower leg, hoof

TALON_LEG.__comment: {20}             (2)        hip, upper leg, knee, lower leg, talon

6PART_LEG.__comment: {100,200,100,40} (2,4,6,8)  hip, upper leg, knee, lower leg, ankle, foot

MANY_LEG.__comment: {10,5}           (100,1000) single part leg      attached to the lower body

TENTACLE_LEG.__comment: {30,30,30,30}    (2,4,6,8)  single part tentacle attached to the lower body

FLIPPER_LEG.__comment: {15,30}          (2,4)      single part flipper  attached to the lower body

behavior.__comment: Diet, attributes, manerisms, personalities, and other things

special.__comment: These are chosen multiple times for each creature and assign special tokens

THICK_WEB.__comment: Shoots web, web immune, thick web

AQUATIC.__comment: Aquatic, immobile land, underswim, no drink, cant jump, innate swim

AQUATIC_V.__comment: Aquatic, immobile land, underswim, no drink, cant jump, innate swim, vermin fish, fish item, vermin notrap

attachments.__comment: Body parts attached to HEAD, UPPERBODY, and LOWERBODY types

TAIL_STING.__comment: Lowerbody tail with stinger NO_MATERIAL    YES_ATTACK   NO_COLOR

TAIL_CLUB.__comment: Lowerbody tail with club    NO_MATERIAL    YES_ATTACK   NO_COLOR

TAIL_PINCH.__comment: Lowerbody tail with pincer  NO_MATERIAL    YES_ATTACK   NO_COLOR

TAIL_SPIKES.__comment: Lowerbody tail with spikes  NO_MATERIAL    YES_ATTACK   NO_COLOR

INTERACTIONS: [RETRACT_INTO_BP:BY_CATEGORY:SHELL:retract into shell:retracts into shell:come out of shell:comes out of shell]

digits.__comment: Body parts attached to GRASP and STANCE types

MOUTH_BASIC.__comment: Mouth with tongue, lips, cheek, and teeth

MOUTH_FANGS.__comment: Mouth with tongue, lips, cheek, and teeth with fangs

BLANK.__comment: A blank attack for copy and paste purposes

TAIL_SLAP.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category tail

TAIL_SPIKE.__comment: (main, second) attack with spikes as child of body part category tail

BODY_SLAM.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part type upperbody

BS_SPIKE.__comment: (main, second) attack with spikes as child of body part type upperbody

HEADBUTT.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part type head

HB_SHELL.__comment: (main, second) attack with shell as child of body part type head

HB_SPIKE.__comment: (main, second) attack with spikes as child of body part type head

PINCER.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category pincer

STINGER.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category stinger

CLUB.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category club

SCYTHE.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category scythe

HOOF.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category hoof

TENTACLE.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category tentacle

FLIPPER.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category flipper

TALON.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category talon

BEAK.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category beak

CLAW.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category claw

BITE.__comment: (main, second) attack with teeth as child of body part head

KICK.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part type stance

PUNCH.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part type grasp

SCRATCH.__comment: (main, second) attack with tissue layer nail by category finger

HORN.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category horn

TUSK.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category tusk

MANDIBLE.__comment: (main, second) attack with body part category mandible

SURFACE_SKIN.__comment: Materials = [Skin and leather],             Tissues = [thin, average, thick]

SURFACE_SCALES.__comment: Materials = [Scale and tanned scale],       Tissues = [thin, average, thick]

SURFACE_CHITIN.__comment: Materials = [Chitin and tanned chitin],     Tissues = [thin, average, thick]

INSULATION_FAT.__comment: Materials = [BASE] (should it pick?),       Tissues = [thin, average, thick]

MEAT_MUSCLE.__comment: Materials = [BASE] (should it pick?),       Tissues = [thin, average, thick]

BODY_BASIC.__comment: Slight variations in height, length, and broadness

BODY_VARIATION.__comment: Large variations in height, length, and broadness

EYES_BASIC.__comment: Sets eye color and eye position and shape

EYES_VARIATION.__comment: Large variations in eye color and eye position and shape

MOUTH_BASIC.__comment: Sets lips and tooth position and shape

MOUTH_VARIATION.__comment: Large variations in lips and tooth position and shape

EARS_VARIATION.__comment: Large variations in ear shape and size

HEAD_BASIC.__comment: Sets skull shape and head size

HEAD_VARIATION.__comment: Large variations in skull shape and head size

NOSE_VARIATION.__comment: Large variations in nose shape and size

age.__comment: Baby age, child age, max age (years)

size.__comment: new born size, child size, adult size, trade capacity

speed.__comment: !!!!!! NEED TO FIGURE THIS OUT !!!!! Just picked 8 speeds semi-randomly
